title: Bug 10022: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'. The 'Build' menu option still appears in the Java popup menus, which is incorrect.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should respect the user's preference of 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'. If the user selects this option in Preferences > Workbench, the 'Build' menu option should no longer appear in the Java popup menus.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'.
4. Right-click on any Java resource.
5. Verify that the 'Build' menu option is still present in the popup menu, even though it should not be.
